description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Object Form.

breakpoints.description: Defines the screen size breakpoints for this column definition
breakpoints.label: Breakpoints

columns.description: Sets the number of columns to split the object.
columns.label: Columns

embedded.description: Options to apply to embedded objects.
embedded.label: Embedded

filterOptions.description: An object describing a particular set of filtering options, including the ability to recurse it to embedded objects.
filterOptions.label: Filter Options

headerOptions.description: Determines when headers should be applied to Object Forms and their embedded objects.
headerOptions.label: Header Options

isCollapsed.description: Should embedded objects in collapsible layouts be collapsed by default.
isCollapsed.label: Is Collapsed

nestingDepth.description: Current nested depth from embedded objects.
nestingDepth.label: Nesting Depth

object.description: The object to be displayed by the Object Form Layout component.
object.label: Object

preferredComponents.description: Sets preferences for components for Adaptive Properties.
preferredComponents.label: Preferred Components

readOnlyOrientation.description: In readonly mode, labels and values should be stacked horizontal (row) or vertical (column).
readOnlyOrientation.label: Readonly Orientation

showLabels.description: The properties should be displayed along with their labels instead of property names.
showLabels.label: Show Labels

showDescriptions.description: The property descriptions should be displayed in editable mode.
showDescriptions.label: Show Descriptions

sortOptions.description: An object describing a particular set of sorting options, including the ability to recurse it to embedded objects.
sortOptions.label: Sort Options

showMeta.description: If true, the object's metadata should also be displayed.
showMeta.label: Show Meta
